Treatment of late-stage breast cancer (stage III and stage IV) may include the following:         -  Radiation therapy.    -  Chemotherapy.        Radiation therapy and chemotherapy should not be given during the first 3 months of pregnancy.",CancerGov,Breast Cancer
What is (are) Hairy Cell Leukemia ?,"Key Points
                    - Hairy cell leukemia is a type of cancer in which the bone marrow makes too many lymphocytes (a type of white blood cell).    - Leukemia may affect red blood cells,
